Flow.description: using email instead of last name

recordCreates.label: Create Campaign Member Status Did Not Attend

recordLookups.label: Get Contacts at Only First Account

fields.name: Event_Time
fields.helpText: Enter the time in 12:15 (HH:MM) format. This time will appear on your event emails. Select AM/PM in the next field.

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter the event time in HH:MM format. Select AM/PM in the next field.

fields.name: PostEventEmails
fields.fieldText: How would you like to communicate with attendees following the event?

fields.name: Do_not_schedule_a_post_event_email
fields.fieldText: Do not schedule a post-event email. I will decide after the event what I want to send.

fields.name: Send_a_generic_post_event_email
fields.fieldText: I will not update the event status. Send a generic email after the event to all attendees.

fields.name: Date_to_send_automated_follow_up
fields.fieldText: Date to send automated follow up

fields.name: I_will_update_the_event_status_Send_separate_emails_for_attendees_who_attended_a
fields.fieldText: I will update the event status. Send separate emails for attendees who attended and did not attend.

fields.name: Date_to_send_conditional_follow_up
fields.fieldText: Date to send conditional follow up

fields.name: Success
fields.fieldText:
Success!


Your event has been created! Reminder emails will launch on the days you selected.
